attributes.action: Bring the UK power companies to book over the inflated prices for our gas and electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should my energy bills rise by between 30 - 40% when today's oil price ( 7/11/08 ) is at $61 per barrel. I had an email from my energy provider quoting the January oil price of $92 and then July at $134 per barrel for the reason.

We were quick to bail the banks out, if we all warmed our houses up like we would like to then no one would afford their bills and then the government would have to nationlise the UK power companies.

Maybe not a bad thing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
